mapper.select: select count(1) total,ceil(count(1)/${pageSize}) totalPage,${pageSize} pageSize,${currPage} currPage from menu where Exists(select bid,mid from menu group by bid,mid) order by bid,mid DESC

select m.bid,b.bname,m.mid,m.mname,m.bcontent from (select n.*,rownum rn from (select * from menu order by 1 ) n where ${pageSize}*${currPage}>=rownum) m join book b on m.bid=b.bid where rn>${pageSize}*(${currPage}-1) and Exists(select bid,mid from menu group by bid,mid) order by bid,mid DESC
mapper.delete: delete menu where mid=#{mid} and bid=#{bid}
mapper.select: select * from menu where bid like '%${bid}%'
